title: TVET-Based 21st-Century Competency Enhancement Project: Language Practitioner Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language education experience and job-related basic practical skills
context.additional_context: Employs smartphone-based collaboration tools for field-oriented task performance

learning_goals: Learners can create multimedia materials for language education using digital media and smartphones.
Learners can creatively solve real-world problems encountered in language education settings through team-based project execution.
Learners can perform peer evaluations using collaboration tools and improve language education modules by incorporating feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
